abortChallenge(uint256).details: only challenger can give up his/her challenge

agentCompleteDailyChallenges(uint256,add.details: complete multiple daily challenges. Only group agent can run.

completeDailyChallenges(uint256,address,.details: complete multiple daily challenges. Only challenger and group agent can run.

params._goal: challenge goal for frontend app to determine whether to complete the goal
params._targetDays: target days to determine if the challenge is successful

params._agent: agent address to help sending complete days
params._id: any unsigned integer but must greater than 0 and no one use it before
params._maxDays: max days for challenge. Must less than or equal to global maxDays
params._maxDelayDays: max delay days for challenge to complete daily goal
params._minAmount: min amount for challenge and sponsor
params._minDays: min days for challenge. Must greater than or equal to global minDays

finishChallenge(uint256,address).details: only challenger can finish succeed challenge. Anyone can finish failed challenge for bonus.

getCurrentChallenge(uint256,address).details: get the newest round of challenge

groupWithdraw(uint256).details: withdraw the balance of challenge group. Only group owner can withdraw.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

modifyChallengeGroup(uint256,string,stri.details: you can only modify name, url and minAmount

ownerWithdraw().details: withdraw the balance of owner. Only contract owner can withdraw.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

agentCompleteDailyChallenges(uint256,add.notice: Complete daily challenge from different challengers

canSponsor(uint256,address).notice: Determine if it's be able to sponsor challenge or not

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
